Artist: Kseniia Boguslavskaia, Vladimir Kozlinskii, Sergei Makletsov, Jean Pougny (Ivan Puni)
CreditLine: Gift of The Judith Rothschild Foundation
Keywords: Sergei Makletsov and Jean Pougny (Ivan Puni)
